# Enable Twitter ID synchronization:Twitter API returned a 401 (Unauthorized), This request is not properly authenticated.

## Description


Getting error while enabling Twitter Tailored Audiences ID Synchronization.


## Resolution


There are some situations when a customer tries to enable Twitter Tailored Audiences ID Synchronization they got below error message:

![](data:image/png;base64,)

When I did detailed investigation on it, I figured out that, <b>Segments with "&" or "%" in their name cann't be mapped to twitter</b>. So, please keep it in mind will trying to enable Twitter ID Sync. Unfortunately we can't update the customer UI error message because that error messsage directly comes from Twitter API.
